components.name: Layout
components.description: Root layout component that defines the page structure, RTL support, and global styles

components.name: Header
components.description: RTL-optimized header with logo, navigation menu, and CTA button

components.name: HeroSection
components.description: Eye-catching hero section with headline, subheadline, and CTA

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Showcase of salon services with descriptions and visual elements

components.name: GallerySection
components.description: Visual showcase of salon work with filterable categories

components.name: AboutSection
components.description: Information about the salon's history, expertise, and unique approach

components.name: StylistsSection
components.description: Showcase of salon stylists with their specialties and experience

components.name: FAQSection
components.description: Frequently asked questions with expandable answers

components.name: ContactForm
components.description: RTL-optimized contact form with validation and submission handling

components.name: LocationSection
components.description: Map and contact information for the salon

components.name: TestimonialSection
components.description: Customer reviews and testimonials in a carousel format

components.name: PromotionBanner
components.description: Attention-grabbing banner for special offers or promotions

components.name: Footer
components.description: Comprehensive footer with navigation, contact info, and social links

components.name: Button
components.description: Reusable button component with multiple variants

components.name: Card
components.description: Reusable card component for displaying content blocks

components.name: ServicesPage
components.description: Dedicated page for detailed service information

components.name: GalleryPage
components.description: Dedicated page for an expanded portfolio gallery

components.name: ContactPage
components.description: Dedicated contact page with form and additional information

components.name: utils
components.description: Utility functions for form validation, animations, and other helpers

components.name: types
components.description: TypeScript type definitions for the project
